entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
